variant.question: Which of the following cloud types is most readily detected by airborne weather radar?

options.text: cumulus
stratus
cirrocumulus
altostratus

variant.question: Why is a secondary radar display screen free of storm clutter?

options.text: Echo returns are not used in secondary radar.
A moving target indicator facility suppresses the display of static or near-static returns.
The frequencies used are too low to give returns from moisture sources.
The frequencies used are too high to give returns from moisture sources.

variant.question: Why is a secondary radar display screen free of storm clutter?

options.text: The principle of echo return is not used in secondary radar.
The frequencies employed are too high to give returns from moisture sources.
The frequencies employed are too low to give returns from moisture sources.
A moving target indicator facility suppresses the display of static or near static returns.

variant.question: Which of the following phenomena is least likely to be detected by radar?

options.text: Clear air turbulence
Precipitation
Wet snow and turbulence in cloud that has precipitation
Turbulence in cloud that has precipitation

variant.question: Your radar has a slotted planar array. Which functions can it perform?

options.text: Use a cosecant squared beam and tilt down for mapping the ground ahead.
Use cosecant square beam to view mapping function vertically down.
Use cosecant squared beam to scan in mapping mode.
Omnidirectional mapping.

variant.question: Which of the following inputs does a modern airborne weather radar need to detect wind shear?

options.text: Doppler techniques, inertial data, and air data.
manual gain control in the WX mode.
manual tilt control in the MAP mode.
different wavelengths and beam widths in the WXT mode.

variant.question: Which statement relating to the stabilization of airborne weather radar antennae is true?

options.text: They are stabilized with respect to the pitch and roll axis but not with respect to the yaw-axis.
The pilot can choose the axes of stabilization with the systemâ€™s stabilization selector switch.
They are stabilized with respect to the pitch, roll, and yaw-axis.
They are stabilized with respect to the yaw-axis, but not with respect to the pitch and roll axis.

variant.question: Which statement relating to the stabilization of airborne weather radar antennas is true?

options.text: They are stabilized with respect to the  pitch and  rollaxis but not with respect to the yaw-axis.
They are stabilized with respect to the pitch, roll, and yaw-axis.
The pilot can choose the axes of stabilization with the systems stabilization selector switch.
They are stabilized with respect to the yaw-axis, but not with respect to the pitch and roll axis.
